name: Real Estate Fix & Flip Calculator
author: HtAG Analytics

sections.description:
Free plugin that offers an on-page Fix & Flip Calculator via a shortcode or widget. Great value-add for Real Estate Agent websites that drives lead generation from real estate investors looking for renovate and sell properties.

FEATURE SUMMARY:

  • Add “Fix & Flip Calculator” instantly to any page or blog post via the [FaF_calculator] shortcode
  • Add “Fix & Flip Calculator” instantly to footer or sidebar via the provided widget
  • Fully responsive so works and looks great on both PC and mobile
  • Animated Bar-chart costs to visualise the required investment
  • Intuitive and easy to use interface with calculations generated with a click of 1 button
  • Plugin assets only added to the page/post where it’s deployed so as to not impact load time on other pages
  • Free now and forever – no hidden costs, no trials, no third party sign-ups, no limits on features

Demo

For a preview of how plugin works on a live website see this Real Estate Calculator web page.

Also check out our other calculators:

Stamp Duty Calculator
Borrowing Power Calculator
Loan Comparison Calculator
sections.installation:
1. Install from WordPress
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use [FaF_calculator] shortcode to add the calculator to a page or a post
  4. Use the FaF_calculator widget and drag it to relevant section of the website via the Appearance -> Widgets menu
sections.faq:
How do I add the calculator to a page or post?

Use [FaF_calculator] shortcode to add the calculator to a page or a post

Ho do I add the calculator to a sidebar / footer?

Use the Fix and Flip Calculator widget and drag it to relevant section of the website via the Appearance -> Widgets menu. See screenshot section for details.

Will the plugin slow down my site?

No, the plugin loads its’ resources in an an optimal way that does not impact page load times.

What is Fixing & Flipping?

Fixing and flipping is when an investor purchases a house or an apartment, remodels the property to add value and then sells it for profit.
